thread.title: Cab Driver Gets an AMAZING Surprise After He Calls John Elway the Best Quarterback of All Time
thread.title_full: Cab Driver Gets an AMAZING Surprise After He Calls John Elway the Best Quarterback of All Time

author: Robin Zlotnick
title: Cab Driver Gets an AMAZING Surprise After He Calls John Elway the Best Quarterback of All Time
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 324 Shares 
Mr. Sam Snow told a group of passengers that John Elway was his favorite NFL quarterback of all time, not realizing a certain someone was in his car. 
Hint: It was John Elway. The Washington D.C. cab driver had no idea he was driving John Elway around when his passengers asked him about his favorite QBs of all time. via: Facebook 
He wore a jacket covered in Super Bowl patches, so the group in the back of his car, which just so happened to include John Elway, struck up a conversation about football. 
Snow immediately listed John Elway as his number one pick for the best NFL quarterback ever, but he had absolutely no clue that Elway was in his backseat! When the group finally asked Snow to turn around, he immediately recognized Elway and totally freaked. 
He asked for a picture, which Elway happily agreed to, and repeated, “C’mon man, are you serious?!” while shaking the football legend’s hand. 
The video is hilarious, heartwarming, and adorable all at the same time. And of course, it quickly went viral once it was posted on Facebook.
